Abstract: Simon Gagne, who briefly considered retirement after sustaining a concussion in December and missing the rest of the regular season, has been cleared to play in the Stanley Cup finals against the Devils.
Snippet: Simon Gagne, who briefly considered retirement after sustaining a concussion in December and missing the rest of the regular season, has been cleared to play in the Stanley Cup finals against the Devils.
LeadParagraph: EL SEGUNDO, Calif. — Sometime between Christmas and New Year’s Day, one of the N.H.L.’s leading wings contemplated premature retirement.

Headline.Main: Kings’ Gagne Cleared to Return for Stanley Cup Finals
Headline.PrintHeadline: Kings’ Gagne Cleared to Return for Stanley Cup Finals
